ch0116_10_hikari/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey! Did you have some nice dreams last night,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0116_10_hikari/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope today turns out even better than anything
you could dream of!
ch0116_10_hikari/7101_0701_01_10:
How do you like my sygna suit? I think it makes
me look like a hero!
ch0116_10_hikari/7101_0701_02_10:
With this on and Cresselia by my side, no
opponent is too scary to face! They can
come at me however they please!
ch0116_10_hikari/7102_0701_01_10:
When I first met Cresselia, I was so entranced
by her beauty! It was like nothing I’d seen before!
ch0116_10_hikari/7102_0701_02_10:
I didn’t know this, but when you see something so
gorgeous, it actually leaves you speechless!
ch0116_10_hikari/7103_0701_01_10:
When I wear this sygna suit, I feel like it amplifies
my courage... Like I can do anything, even if I
couldn’t before!
ch0116_10_hikari/7103_0701_02_10:
Huh? I’m like that even without the suit? Are you
sure about that?
ch0116_10_hikari/7104_0701_01_10:
Cresselia’s my trusty partner, but it’s not like we’re
always together.
ch0116_10_hikari/7104_0701_02_10:
That said, whenever I’m in a pinch, Cresselia’s
always there to help me out!
ch0116_10_hikari/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s why I feel brave enough to put my all into
everything I do, no matter what!
ch0116_10_hikari/7105_0701_01_10: I met Cresselia in the Sinnoh region.
ch0116_10_hikari/7105_0701_02_10:
She kept running away to all sorts of places, so it
was really hard to catch her!
ch0116_10_hikari/7105_0701_03_10:
I still have fond memories of chasing her! It was
actually a lot of fun!
ch0116_10_hikari/7105_0701_04_10:
The more you work hard together, the stronger
your friendship becomes!
ch0116_10_hikari/7105_0701_05_10:
You and I have been working real hard on Pasio,
haven’t we! I think we’ve gotten a lot closer
because of it!
ch0116_10_hikari/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Here—a present from me!
ch0116_10_hikari/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you treasure it! Or feel free to use it!
ch0116_10_hikari/2501_0701_01_10:
This sygna suit is designed to look like a
prince—just like the ones I saw in the
fairy tales I read when I was little.
ch0116_10_hikari/2501_0701_02_10:
That was around the time I started thinking that
I wanted to help everyone around me!
ch0116_10_hikari/2501_0701_03_10:
I guess that’s why, even today, people say that I
like to take care of others!
ch0116_10_hikari/2501_0702_01_10: Wanting to help someone is really a nice feeling.
ch0116_10_hikari/2501_0702_02_10: I hope I never forget how to feel this way!
ch0116_10_hikari/2511_0701_01_10:
You know how you can have a bunch of childhood
dreams but not all of them come true?
ch0116_10_hikari/2511_0701_02_10:
Even if a dream doesn’t work out, that doesn’t
mean it wasn’t worth believing.
ch0116_10_hikari/2511_0701_03_10:
After all, your dreams are what shaped you into
who you are today!
ch0116_10_hikari/2511_0702_01_10: What kind of dreams did you have in the past?
ch0116_10_hikari/2511_0702_02_10:
You can think about them when you need a little
motivation!
ch0116_10_hikari/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s still morning, but I know I’ll be exhausted by
lunchtime—because I’m always giving my all!
ch0116_10_hikari/3003_0701_01_10:
If you ever need a hand, just let me know!
No matter where I am, I’ll find you!
ch0116_10_hikari/3005_0701_01_10:
If you’re ever having a nightmare, I’ll come save
you—even in your dreams!
